en_US.description: Increase your summoner level

en_US.description: Deal the most damage to champions in the game
en_US.name: Pain Prescriber

en_US.description: Take down the most wards in the game (you must take down at least one ward)

en_US.shortDescription: Take down the most wards in the game

en_US.description: Have the highest Crowd Control Score in the game
en_US.name: Bouncer

en_US.description: Earn points from challenges in the Unrivaled group
en_US.name: Unrivaled

en_US.description: Win games where you took 35% of damage dealt to champions on your team
en_US.name: Meat Shield
en_US.shortDescription: Win the game taking at least 35% of team damage

en_US.description: Deal more than 700 Damage Per Minute
en_US.name: Damage Dispenser
en_US.shortDescription: Deal over 700 Damage Per Minute

en_US.description: Win with each of different mythic items
en_US.name: Multi-Weapon Master
en_US.shortDescription: Win with different mythic items

en_US.description: Kill minions
en_US.name: Do These Things Have Souls?
en_US.shortDescription: Kill minions

en_US.description: Kill players under your own turret
en_US.name: Nice Try
en_US.shortDescription: Kill enemies under your own turret

en_US.description: Place useful Stealth Wards. A useful ward is one that contributes to your Vision Score.

en_US.description: Place useful Control Wards. A useful ward is one that contributes to your Vision Score.

en_US.name: Resourceful

en_US.description: Take down wards

en_US.description: Claim bounty gold from shutting down opposing champions
en_US.name: Everyone Pays!
